message.body: Hey ####. Just wanted to remind you about Lincoln on Sat. He'll need a lunch walk and a dinner walk. For dinner, he takes 1/3 can of food and 1 Pepcid pill. If you have any questions, just let me know. Thanks!
I'll walk and feed him around 8-8:30am and will be back around 12:30-1:00am that night.
That's a lot of crepes, baby!
No problem, it's in my calendar

Oh, good. Glad to hear it! Did Michelle tell you she's giving up the biz. Rosalie said she has a friend who might want to walk. You seeing them any time soon? I don't have her number but can get it from D.
And, of course, if you want to walk more that would be great.
